mapper.select: select rownum no, c.* from(select * from board1 where code = 2 order by id)c order by no desc
select rownum no, c.* from(select * from board1 where code = 1 order by id)c order by no desc
select rownum no, c.* from(select * from hugiboard where code = 3 order by id)c order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into board1 (userid,code, writer, title, content, filename, filepath) values(#{userid}, #{code}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content} , #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into hugiboard (userid, code, writer, title, content, filename, filepath) values(#{userid}, #{code}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content} , #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update board1 set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, filename=#{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filepath=#{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id}
update hugiboard set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, filename=#{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filepath=#{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select c.*, (select writer from member2 where userid = c.userid) writer, to_char(writedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') writedate from board_comments c where pid=#{id} order by id desc
